message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to own a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $9000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I understand that $9000 is a bit high for you, Bob. However, I have to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $8500. This is my best price, and I'm confident you'll find it a great value.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $8500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $7800, but that's as high as I can go. Can you consider that?

I understand that $8500 was still a bit high for you, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can do $8200, but that's as low as I can go. This is a great product, and I'm confident you'll love it.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice, but $8200 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $7500 for the product. Can you consider that?
